text: Ate jinham lokam ne avagi'a kiti uha akhade hana ki asim ho cuki'am hana. Ate jekara tusim usa samem' nu dekho jadom iha zalima apane raba de sahamane kharhe kite janage. (Iha) ika duje ute gala sutade honage. Jihare loka kamazora samajhe jande sana uha vade banana vali'am nu kahinage ki jekara tusim' na hude asim zarura imana vale hude
